casebody.data:
William CALVARESI v. UNITED STATES of America. No. 4761. United States Court of Appeals Tenth Circuit. Oct. 21, 1953. A. X. Erickson, W. H. Erickson and Milton Berger, Denver, Colo., for appellant. Charles S. Vigil, U. S. Atty., and James Heyer, Asst. U. S. Atty., Denver, Colo., for appellee.

Before BRATTON, HUXMAN and PICKETT, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Bail reduced without written opinion.
